Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service Dist. No. 3 -- 8.29 Mills Continuation - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 3 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 3 of the Parish of Vermilion, State of Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a tax of eight and twenty-nine hundredths (8.29) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $242,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of improving and maintaining the buildings and capital facilities of the District and acquiring furnishings and equipment therefor, said millage to represent a one and twenty-nine hundredths mills (1.29) increase over the 7 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2016 pursuant to an election held on November 7, 2006?
